name: Zapatitos: Suenos de Libertad
storyline: Zapatitos returns to his room and after a moment of reflection, sad and at the same time angry at the response of his boss, he decides to leave the circus at all costs, planning to make his escape to the city of Jantana, very early in the morning.
summary: Zapatitos is the star clown of the Tiliches circus, the best at his job, but unhappy since he lives in a slave work environment, a circus life of 24 hours 365 days, Zapatitos who is tired of his work life decides to seek his independence starting with a well-deserved vacation. His boss, Don Chelo has profited for many years from Zapatitos' work and will not let him retire so easily, thereby losing his gold mine. The player must help Zapatitos through 4 levels, fleeing from Don Chelo and his workers, who under his influence will try to stop him along his way, escaping to his vacation and freedom.
